lead_paragraph: The Indian prime minister gave a speech on Monday that was notable for the subjects it avoided: Large-scale job creation, manufacturing and urbanization.

headline.print_headline: After a Year of Outsize Expectations, Modi Adjusts His Political Course
headline.main: After a Year of Outsize Expectations, Narendra Modi Adjusts His Plan for India

snippet: The Indian prime minister gave a speech on Monday that was notable for the subjects it avoided: Large-scale job creation, manufacturing and urbanization.
abstract: News Analysis; Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi gives speech in town of Mathura on anniversary of taking office; praises country's poor and farmers in attempt to counter criticism from opposition leaders in Parliament while avoiding economic topics relating to outsized campaign promises, which have largely gone unfulfilled.
